title: Latest World & National News & Headlines
text:
Trade war fallout: Chinese imports hit post-pandemic low

Chinese imports to the U.S. dropped to their lowest levels since the pandemic as punishing tariffs began to take hold in March.
meta_description: USA TODAY delivers current national and local news, sports, entertainment, finance, technology, and more through award-winning journalism, photos, and videos.
